1. Wichita Falls City Council
  2. District 3 Councilor Jeff Browning

District 3 Councilor Jeff Browning

Appointed July 2018, serving until November 2018 Elected November 2018, serving until November 2020 Re-elected November 2020, serving until November 2023

e-elected November 2023, serving until November 2026

CITY COUNCIL GOALS

  • City Water Resource Development in the future
  • Relationships with City Departments on welcoming in new Businesses and Industry
  • Married to wife Amy since 2000
